Producer: Nicholas Tabarrok, William Santor, Doug Murray
Production Co: Darius Films, Sony Pictures, Productivity Media
Synopsis: Fearing his estranged son murdered, an elderly baker with a dangerous past and his eight-year-old granddaughter must journey to the crime ridden Big City to uncover clues to his disappearance... all with a giant loaf of bread filled with 100K of high-grade heroin.
Title: The Baker
